div.h3: The mission of the Montello School District, an evolving educational community, is to inspire children to be life-long learners. The community will provide our students with the tools to fulfill their unique potential in a safe and positive environment in a fiscally responsible manner.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-OwsYgb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h3.div: Kids Deserve It! is here to stay! The staff of FLCS have identified this phrase as one of our core values, and as such, it continues to influence our actions, guide our work, and focus our attention on what matters most- our students! The staff of FLCS takes great pride in creating an educational atmosphere where all students can grow, take risks, and engage in learning in a caring, positive, and responsive environment. We are passionate about this work, and we are eager to start connecting with and engaging our parents, families, and community members as we bridge gaps, establish partnerships, and work together to provide a top-notch, student-centered education.

div.style: background-size: cover; background-position: center center; background-image: url(https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/Mprw4ZkYfRkiZcYX4OaanSft4igFsnXI1OEfnBaG7YtX6AchGbvRhPkC2BKRRVZ2dnWfx_Wk=w16383);

p.strong: If you have any questions please call the District Office at 608-297-7617 ext. 443
